turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Diane, I'd like you to get a large black and white mocha.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, that'd be fine, but first.. what location?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one on Jefferson and 3rd

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, that's fine!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great Diane! I'm really in dire need of this coffee

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size Black and White Mocha do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Venti, Diane.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, lovely! What type of milk do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Whole Milk would be lovely, Diane

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Understood, now..Whipped cream or no whipped cream?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd love a small portion of Whipped Cream if possible, Diane.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay so let's clarify this one last time: Black and white mocha venti with whole milk and small amount of whipped cream is this correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes that is absolutely correct

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: When would you like me to get it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like it relatively soon~ within an hour

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: That is reasonable and I'll get on it as we speak

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great diane let me know when you're on your way back I'll meet you by the elevator

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want sugar at all?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: You can get a few packets of sugar

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, great.. see you soon!
